description:
Heat-treated to prevent bending and flexing, so it's stiff when you need it.

  • Compatible with 1/8in. fixed gear sprockets
  • Features hardened pins to keep the chain in place
  • 1in. box-end wrench fits Park Tool Freewheel/Cassette Lockring Tools
name: Park Tool SR-18.2 Chain Whip For 1/8in Cogs
